dev.title: Developer Portal
dev.keyWarning: Save this key now. It will only be shown once.
dev.registerDescription: Create a developer account to access the ScamLedger API.
dev.loginDescription: Use your registered Passkey to sign in to the developer portal.
dev.noKeysDescription: Create your first API key to start using the ScamLedger API.
dev.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this API key? This action cannot be undone. Any applications using this key will lose access.

apiDocs.title: API Documentation
apiDocs.description: Integrate ScamLedger threat intelligence into your applications.
apiDocs.quickStartDesc: Get started with the ScamLedger Developer API in minutes.
apiDocs.step1Desc: Navigate to the Developer Portal, register with a Passkey, then create an API key from the dashboard.
apiDocs.step2Desc: All API requests should be sent to:
apiDocs.step3Desc: Include your API key in the X-API-Key header of every request:
apiDocs.searchReports: Search reports by address, chain, scam type
apiDocs.getAddress: Get address details and all associated reports
apiDocs.statsOverview: Total reports, high risk addresses, total loss, monthly reports
apiDocs.authDesc: All Developer API endpoints require authentication via API key.
apiDocs.authKeyFormatDesc: Keys use the prefix csr_ followed by 64 hexadecimal characters.
apiDocs.authStep3: Create a new API key from your dashboard
apiDocs.authStep4: Copy and securely store the key (it is only shown once)
apiDocs.authHeaderDesc: Include the key in the X-API-Key header with every request:
apiDocs.rateLimitsDesc: The Developer API enforces a rate limit of 120 requests per minute per API key.
apiDocs.rateLimitHeaderRemaining: Remaining requests in the current window
apiDocs.rateLimitHeaderReset: Unix timestamp when the window resets
apiDocs.rateLimitExceeded: When the rate limit is exceeded, the API returns a 429 status code. Wait until the reset time before retrying.
apiDocs.errorCodesDesc: All error responses follow a standard format:
apiDocs.errorValidation: Invalid input parameters or missing required fields
apiDocs.errorDuplicate: Same IP reported the same address within 24 hours
apiDocs.errorNotFound: The requested resource was not found
apiDocs.errorMaxKeys: Maximum number of API keys per account reached
apiDocs.supportedChainsDesc: The following blockchain networks are supported:
apiDocs.supportedScamTypesDesc: Reports can be categorized with the following scam types:
